Contractor Registration with the Town of Addison has a new look!

The Town of Addison requires all contractors that wish to perform work within town limits to be registered with the Town prior to the start of any project.

The license holder remains responsible for all work performed within town limits.

The registration application (PDF, 170KB) includes an area where the license holder may designate individuals within their organization to obtain permits on their behalf for work within Addison.

Contractor registration is valid for one year from the date of issuance and requires annual renewal.

Questions regarding registration may be submitted to registrations@addisontx.gov .

Once a Contractor is registered with the town of Addison via the CSS portal , the are required to submit a validation form (PDF, 76KB) attesting that they are the responsible party for their specific scope of work on a specific job site.

Questions regarding contractor validation forms may be submitted to permits@addisontx.gov .

  • Contractor Registration Application (PDF, 170KB)
  • Contractor Validation Form (PDF, 76KB)
